scripts.build: rm -rf assets/dist && cp -a ./bower_components/elosh-client/dist/. ./assets/dist/ && rm -rf assets/dist_production && cp -a ./bower_components/elosh-client/dist_production/. ./assets/dist_production/ && rm -rf assets/foundation.css && cp -a ./bower_components/foundation/css/foundation.css ./assets/foundation.css
